QuestData.Title: Convoy of the Covenants
QuestData.Description:
A new sigil for the Venthyr would require all seven medallions to forge.
The Primus was correct. The person we need is the Stonewright. Her grievances against the Unseen could fill a library and she holds the last of the medallions we need. I believe you and I are long overdue in convincing her to join our cause.
I will make the arrangements. We shall go properly this time, with gifts and diplomacy.
You should warn Chelra, she will want to arrange an escort.
QuestData.LogDescription: Gather the Envoys and ride to Dominance Gate.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Deliver the Primus's message to the Stonewright.
